statements: SELECT * FROM healthcare_professionals;
SELECT name, specialty FROM healthcare_professionals ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, email FROM healthcare_professionals WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_professionals WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%';
SELECT id, name, specialty FROM healthcare_professionals WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_professionals WHERE specialty = 'Cardiologist' AND email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT name, specialty FROM healthcare_professionals WHERE id = 3;
SELECT name, email FROM healthcare_professionals WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_professionals WHERE specialty = 'Dermatologist' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, email, phone_number FROM healthcare_professionals WHERE name LIKE 'Dr.%'
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT patients.patient_id, patients.first_name, patients.last_name, medical_records.diagnosis FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY record_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patients.first_name, medical_records.diagnosis FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE record_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC, last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Hospital;
SELECT id, name FROM Physician WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT name, dob FROM Patient ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT id, name, specialization FROM Physician WHERE hospital_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Patient WHERE physician_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Hospital;
SELECT name, location FROM Hospital WHERE location='New York';
SELECT name, specialization FROM Physician WHERE specialization='Cardiology' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT p.name AS patient_name, p.dob AS date_of_birth, ph.name AS physician_name FROM Patient p JOIN Physician ph ON p.physician_id = ph.id;
SELECT h.name AS hospital_name, COUNT(*) AS patient_count FROM Patient p JOIN Physician ph ON p.physician_id = ph.id JOIN Hospital h ON ph.hospital_id = h.id GROUP BY hospital_name;
SELECT * FROM doctors;
SELECT name, specialization FROM doctors ORDER BY specialization DESC;
SELECT id, name, dob FROM patients WHERE dob >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT doctor_id, patient_id, medication, dosage FROM prescriptions WHERE medication = 'Aspirin';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE reason IS NOT NULL ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM doctors;
SELECT name, specialization FROM doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT id, name, dob FROM patients WHERE dob < '1990-01-01';

SELECT doctors.name AS doctor_name, patients.name AS patient_name, prescriptions.medication AS medication_name FROM doctors INNER JOIN prescriptions ON doctors.id = prescriptions.doctor_id INNER JOIN patients ON prescriptions.patient_id = patients.id;

SELECT appointments.appointment_date, doctors.name AS doctor_name, patients.name AS patient_name FROM appointments INNER JOIN doctors ON appointments.doctor_id = doctors.id INNER JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.id WHERE appointments.appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_professionals;
SELECT id, name, department FROM healthcare_professionals ORDER BY department;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE patient_condition = 'Covid-19';
SELECT record_id, patient_id, doctor_id, diagnosis FROM medical_records ORDER BY record_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_professionals;
SELECT name, department FROM healthcare_professionals WHERE department = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message, timestamp FROM communication_logs WHERE sender_id = 101 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_condition, diagnosis, prescription FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id;
